content: Career General Asked by AnonymousAsked on 21 May 2019Which one should I choose as an upgrading course? I am looking at nail artistry, professional make up or photography course. Can anybody help me with it? Thanks in advance.I intend to take up a new course. Not sure which is a good investment of time and money as a freelancer.2 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 22 May 2019You should learn something that you'd enjoy so that it doesn't turn out to be a chore when you do it!0 comments0

Vincent Tan Wen Bin, Assistant Vice President at Thinkers AllianceLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 22 May 2019What is it that you like most? I believe you must find something that you have an interest and passion for it. Out of the 3 courses, you are able to earn money in all 3 segments. But what you need is to tie in your passion with skillset in sales and marketing. That would make it work. Choose one that you resonate the best with and go for it!0 comments0
